files.description: Single deterministic CLI entrypoint that sets all RNG seeds, runs the canonical pipeline, writes outputs/results.json and outputs/figure.png with fixed schema, and writes outputs/hashes.json with SHA256 hashes of each artifact.
Implements the canonical pipeline steps (data generation/loading, processing, metrics computation, and figure creation) as pure functions to support deterministic execution from the CLI.
Utilities to set seeds across random/numpy/optional torch, enforce deterministic settings, and compute SHA256 hashes for produced artifacts.
Helpers for atomic output writing, JSON schema-stable serialization, and ensuring the outputs directory exists.
End-to-end test that runs the CLI, verifies the existence and schema of results.json, existence of figure.png, and correctness/consistency of hashes.json across repeated runs.
Unit tests for SHA256 hashing utilities and atomic writing to ensure deterministic byte-level outputs.
CI workflow that installs dependencies, runs formatting/linting (if configured), and executes the test suite on supported Python versions for determinism verification.
Project configuration defining dependencies, test tooling, and a console script entry (optional) to invoke src/run.py as the single CLI entrypoint.
Documentation describing how to run the CLI tool, the deterministic guarantees, and the fixed output artifact schemas and locations.

missionDescription: Create a single CLI entrypoint (e.g., src/run.py) that (1) sets all RNG seeds, (2) runs the canonical pipeline, (3) writes ./outputs/results.json and ./outputs/figure.png with a fixed schema, and (4) writes ./outputs/hashes.json containing SHA256 of each artifact for determinism verification.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Directly establishes the /outputs contract by producing deterministic, overwrite-safe artifacts (results.json, figure.png) and adds a determinism check, enabling regression testing and stable iteratio...
